content: विशुद्ध {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Purified, cleansed. {@--2@} Pure, free from vice, sin, or imperfection. {@--3@} Spotless, stainless. {@--4@} Correct, accurate. {@--5@} Virtuous, pious, straightforward; विशुद्धमुग्धः कुलकन्यकाजनः <ls>Māl. 7. 1.</ls> {@--6@} Humble --द्धं A kind of mystical circle (चक्र) in the body.
